mapper.insert: insert into answer( qust_no , answ_cont, answ_long, mem_id, answ_date )values( #{qustNo}, #{answCont}, #{answLong}, #{memId}, GETDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT qust_no FROM SURVQUST WHERE surv_no = #{survNo} ) AS qust INNER JOIN (SELECT qust_no FROM ANSWER WHERE mem_id = #{memId} ) AS answ ON qust.qust_no = answ.qust_no ;
